actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to extend and revise the District of Columbia Civil Contempt Imprisonment Limitation Act of 1989, and for other purposes.
short_title: District of Columbia Child Custody Civil Contempt Extension and Revision Act of 1991

summary.text: District of Columbia Child Custody Civil Contempt Extension and Revision Act of 1991 - Amends the District of Columbia Code to require any order of the D.C. Superior Court or the D.C. Court of Appeals issued relating to the incarceration of an individual for civil contempt in a child custody case to be reviewed by a judge of that court, other than the judge who entered the order, every 30 days while the incarceration continues to ensure that further incarceration is appropriate.

titles.title: District of Columbia Child Custody Civil Contempt Extension and Revision Act of 1991
A bill to extend and revise the District of Columbia Civil Contempt Imprisonment Limitation Act of 1989, and for other purposes.
